# gulp-imgminify
compress local image

压缩本地图片工具

## Install
```
$ npm install --save-dev gulp-imgminify
```

## How to use
```
var gulp = require('gulp');
var imgminify = require('gulp-imgminify');

gulp.task('imgminify', function (cb) {
    return gulp.src(['build/*.{jpg,png}'])
        .pipe(imgminify());
        // .pipe(gulp.dest('release/'));
});
```
